name: Paras
overview: Military strategists at High Command have drawn up a plan which will bring and end to the war within weeks. the entire plan relies on breaking the enemy's main lines of communication. On the 14th of March at 06:00hrs, twenty seven teams of highly trained specialists will be dropped behind enemy lines. YOU are in command of one of thesse forces -- your objective - DESTROY THE BRIDGE. Released as part of the "Variety Pack 1".
